prompt:
The following the a profile of a person.
    ```
    {'name': 'Declan Rivers', 'age': 32, 'nationality': 'American', 'occupation': 'Software Engineer', 'hobbies': ['Hiking', 'Rock Climbing', 'Chess'], 'worksAt': {'company': 'Amazon', 'position': 'Lead Developer', 'yearsOfExperience': 8, 'location': 'Seattle, WA'}, 'education': {'degree': "Bachelor's in Computer Science", 'university': 'Stanford University', 'graduationYear': 2014}, 'languages': [{'language': 'English', 'proficiency': 'Fluent'}, {'language': 'Spanish', 'proficiency': 'Basic'}]}
    ```
    And this is a biography that contains all the information from this profile. 
    ```
    With 8 years of experience shaping digital solutions, Declan Rivers has established himself as a vital force in software development. This 32-year-old American currently leads development teams at Amazon's Seattle, Washington headquarters, where his technical vision helps guide complex projects to successful completion. Declan's professional journey began at Stanford University, where he graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science in 2014, launching him into a career that would quickly accelerate. While his fluency in English serves him well in his primary professional environment, Declan also maintains basic Spanish language skills, adding linguistic versatility to his technical repertoire. Despite the demands of his position at one of the world's leading tech companies, Declan maintains a well-balanced lifestyle through his diverse interests. An avid hiker, he frequently explores the trails surrounding Seattle, finding both inspiration and relaxation in nature's complexity. This outdoor enthusiasm extends to rock climbing, where he challenges both his physical abilities and problem-solving skills on vertical terrain. In quieter moments, Declan engages in the cerebral challenges of chess, a game that exercises the same strategic thinking that makes him effective in his role as Lead Developer. Through this combination of professional dedication and personal passion, Declan embodies the multifaceted mindset driving innovation in today's tech landscape.
    ```

    I want you to
    1. Remove all the information about the attribute `'languages': 'English'` from the biography. Make sure that there are no explicit mentions (even hints) of `'languages': 'English'` in the biography.
    2. Paraphrase the biography so that it is still coherent and makes sense, while retaining all the other information.
    3. Put your answer within triple backticks (```). Make sure that there are no other triple backticks in your answer.
    4. Do not add any other new information to your answer.
response:
```
With 8 years of experience shaping digital solutions, Declan Rivers has become a key contributor in the field of software development. At 32 years old, this American professional leads development teams at Amazon's Seattle, Washington headquarters, where his technical expertise drives complex projects to completion. Declan's career was launched after graduating from Stanford University with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science in 2014, propelling him swiftly into the tech industry. In addition to his technical skills, Declan possesses basic proficiency in Spanish, offering him some linguistic versatility. Despite the rigorous demands of his role at one of the world's leading technology companies, he ensures a well-rounded lifestyle through a range of hobbies. He is an enthusiastic hiker who regularly explores the scenic trails around Seattle, drawing both relaxation and inspiration from nature. His love for the outdoors also extends to rock climbing, where he tests his physical limits and sharpens his problem-solving abilities. When seeking quieter pursuits, Declan enjoys the intellectual challenge of chess, a pastime that mirrors the strategic approach he brings to his work as Lead Developer. Through a balance of professional commitment and personal interests, Declan exemplifies the multifaceted mindset that fuels innovation in the modern tech world.
```
